title: EU4 mod - Extended Vanilla Experience
description:
EU4 mod - Extended Vanilla Experience


Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


DESCRIPTION
EUIV 1.7 Compatible 

Extended Vanilla Experience is a mod aiming to overhaul EUIV without destroying the look, feel or performance of the game. The long term plan is to rework all areas of EUIV to create a more fun and balanced experience. 

Current Features 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Completely Rebalanced National & Group Ideas 
--- Across the board nerf of military bonuses in national ideas 
--- Large reworks to several national idea groups such as the Netherlands & Russia 
--- Thirty-Nine new sets of national ideas Full List Here 
--- New idea groups 
--- Emphasis on player choice created, especially on the military category 
--- Effects of all idea groups have been rebalanced 
--- Decisions to switch between exclusive groups 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Trade Node Rework 
--- Almost all trade nodes have been changed in some way 
--- There is now less direct routes to far off nodes to encourage competition 
--- Added new nodes to encourage fighting over certain areas 
--- Added lots of new node connections that encourage conflict & expansion in certain directions 
--- Removed the western europe node & all of the other worthless nodes 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Military & Warfare Improvement 
--- The maintenance cost of armies now grows per military tech at a rate of 5% 
--- Reinforcing armies is now more expensive 
--- Navies now require manpower for both construction & maintenance 
--- Base supply limit slightly reduced 
--- Lots of other small changes 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reworked Religions 
--- Rebalanced the effects of all religions 
--- Piety mechanic added to all eastern religions & Sikhism 
--- Church Influence mechanic added to Protestant & Coptic Religions 
--- Rebalanced the effects of Piety, Church Influence & Fervor mechanics 
--- The effect of changing religion varies depending on the religious landscape of your nation 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reworked Policies 
--- Rebalanced the effects of almost every single policy 
--- Reorganised lots of policies for the changes to group ideas 
--- Added some new policies 
--- Removed many of the existing Policies because they were duplicates 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Miscellaneous 
--- Over Twenty new formable nations Full List Here 
--- Eleven new advisor types 
--- Five new triggered modifiers 
--- Nine new straits 
--- New government types, some unique & some standard 
--- Over one hundred new events 
--- Lots of new decisions 
--- Reworked cultures & culture spreading mechanic 
--- Some Policies have been rebalanced 
--- Rebalanced the power projection mechanic 
--- Improved flags 
--- Slightly altered map few a few new provinces 
--- Added impassable terrain over some mountainous areas 
--- Truce scaling has been adjusted to one year at white peace & 10 years at 100% warscore 
--- & much more 

Stuff That is Planned 
--- Introduce new sets of national ideas 
--- Large government overhaul
